parchi's dumpster fire

welcome to my haphazardly put together little corner of the internet!

i'm a wip programmer, music writer, and game designer.
not entirely sure what else to put here.

i go by quite a few names online, namely Parchment, Parchi, Parchii, and formerly Wainggan.
i prefer Parchi.

this site was put together using whatever html knowledge I happened to know, so i apologise if the layout is a bit odd or broken. yes, i know the navigation bar is too far from the main content.
i plan to use this site as a personal outlet for whatever my slightly wacky brain comes up with, the site is only public to pay my tribute to the entropy of the internet.
maybe i'll be tangibly useful by talking educational things about computer science, game design, drawing, music production, as I continually learn more about the stuff.

expect a lot of todo's to be littered around.
